Is it a raccoon? Is it a dog? No, it's a raccoon dog!

01-27-2015

Raccoon dogs have been adorably taking the internet by storm. Aside from cuteness, what else makes this animal so interesting? Raccoon dogs, also known as "Tanuki," are actually neither dogs nor raccoons! They are members of the canid family, which includes dogs, wolves, and foxes. They are the only member...
